ALTER TABLE table_name
ADD COLUMN new_column_name data_type constraint;

Steps to execute in Docker Desktop
---Docker run 
--Pull the docker image
docker pull ******(Azure ACR name).azurecr.io/helios:latest
docker images
--Run the image
docker run -it *****(Azure ACR name).azurecr.io/helios:latest cmd.exe
--mount folder
https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/containers/Container-Fundamentals--Part-3-Shared-Folders
docker images
docker run -it -v c:\Pouchimages:c:\DockerDemoImages (ImageId) cmd
docker run -it -v c:\Pouchimages:c:\app\Pouchimages 4e9fec23c7a5 cmd

--PgAdmin process
https://lchsk.com/how-to-connect-to-a-host-postgres-database-from-a-docker-container.html
"Host=host.docker.internal;Port=5432;Username=fddf8979435rlnhfrsg79sefu;Password=dsakdsa8t732iokn4r42f9i7dhas;Database=pi"
Add columns jsondeposited,csvdeposited,colorimagedeposited,monoimagedeposited,randfrac

Run functions  get_allpouchsbydrugs,get_pouch_details

Fetch the All pouchs by drugs
SELECT public.get_allpouchsbydrugs(

)
Fetching folders from shared folder match pouchs and images based on key 
SetHashSetKey =(pouch.Pouchid, pouch.Fkbatch, pouch.Pathmonth, pouch.Pathyear)
let HashSetKey = $"{fileName}_{fileFullpath[fileFullpath.Length - 2]}_{fileFullpath[fileFullpath.Length - 3]}_{fileFullpath[fileFullpath.Length - 4]}"
---Sample Data
id,pouchid,fkbatch,pathyear,pathmonth
"(9721596,01000Z7K010T,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721591,01000Z7K010O,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721570,01000Z7K0103,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721570,01000Z7K0103,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721570,01000Z7K0103,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721570,01000Z7K0103,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721571,01000Z7K0104,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721571,01000Z7K0104,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721571,01000Z7K0104,64756,2020,11)"
"(9721571,01000Z7K0104,64756,2020,11)"
---------------------------------
--Get pouch details save json,csv files in blob
SELECT public.get_pouch_details(
	'01000Z7K010T','64756'
)
SELECT public.get_pouch_details(
	'01000Z7K010O','64756'
)
SELECT public.get_pouch_details(
	'01000Z7K0104','64756'
)
SELECT public.get_pouch_details(
	'01000Z7K0103','64756'
)
----------------------
--Check before run the job jsondeposited,csvdeposited should be false other wise that pouches not process.
select jsondeposited,csvdeposited,* from tblpouch  WHERE pouchid in ('01000Z7K010T','01000Z7K010O','01000Z7K0103','01000Z7K0104');
--UPDATE tblpouch SET jsondeposited=FALSE,csvdeposited=FALSE WHERE pouchid  in ('01000Z7K010T','01000Z7K010O','01000Z7K0103','01000Z7K0104');
----------------------------------------
select jsondeposited,csvdeposited,* from tblpouch  WHERE pouchid in ('014IQZ0FZX010DC','014IQZ0FZX010EC','014IQZ0FZX010FC','014IQZ0FZX0101C','014IQZ0FZX0102C','014IQZ0FZX0103C','014IQZ0FZX0104C','014IQZ0FZX0105C');
--UPDATE tblpouch SET jsondeposited=FALSE,csvdeposited=FALSE WHERE pouchid  in ('014IQZ0FZX010DC','014IQZ0FZX010EC','014IQZ0FZX010FC','014IQZ0FZX0101C','014IQZ0FZX0102C','014IQZ0FZX0103C','014IQZ0FZX0104C','014IQZ0FZX0105C');	
	
	--Local
	"(1003,010013MH0103,1001,2020,2)"
"(1004,010013MH0104,1001,2020,2)"
"(1005,010013MH0105,1001,2020,2)"
	select jsondeposited,csvdeposited,* from tblpouch  WHERE pouchid in ('010013MH0103','010013MH0104','010013MH0105');
--UPDATE tblpouch SET jsondeposited=FALSE,csvdeposited=FALSE WHERE pouchid  in ('010013MH0103','010013MH0104','010013MH0105');
SELECT public.get_pouch_details(
	'010013MH0102','1001'
)

////Linux process
step:1  Pull  the linux image from ACR
docker pull pillpouchpredictiondemo.azurecr.io/helios:linux

step:2 Run the image
docker run -d pillpouchpredictiondemo.azurecr.io/helios:linux

step:3 Mount the C:\Pouchimages to linux folder /app/Pouchimages 
docker run -it --rm --name mount-images --mount type=bind,source=C:\Pouchimages,target=/app/Pouchimages cce19ad263c1
Note: Command prompt run the docker images command to get the Docker image id.

step:4 Check pgadmin to process images
		1)Fetch the All pouchs by drugs
		SELECT public.get_allpouchsbydrugs(

		)
		2)Select any one pouch

		"(9721571,01000Z7K0104,64756,2020,11)"
		SELECT public.get_pouch_details(
			'01000Z7K0104','64756'
		)
		"(9721571,01000Z7K0104,7,75mm,"2020-11-18 08:38:54.149",2020-11-20,09:00:00,f,,t,,0.100745)"

		3) Update flags
		UPDATE tblpouch SET jsondeposited=FALSE,csvdeposited=FALSE WHERE pouchid  in ('01000Z7K0104');

step:5 : Code executed only once. So run step 3 every time if required to process images.
